member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation.LazyMetadataReferenceFeature.References
member.remarks: Invoking ensures that compilation references are lazily evaluated.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation.MvcRazorRuntimeCompilationOptions.FileProviders
member.summary: Gets the instances used to locate Razor files.
member.remarks: At startup, this collection is initialized to include an instance of that is rooted at the application root.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation.MvcRazorRuntimeCompilationOptions.AdditionalReferencePaths
member.summary: Gets paths to additional references used during runtime compilation of Razor files.
member.remarks: By default, the runtime compiler to gather references uses to compile a Razor file. This API allows providing additional references to the compiler.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation.Resources.CompilationFailed
member.summary: One or more compilation failures occurred:

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation.Resources.Compilation_MissingReferences
member.summary: One or more compilation references may be missing. If you're seeing this in a published application, set '{0}' to true in your project file to ensure files in the refs directory are published.
